## Hls.autoLevelCapping property

Capping/max level value that should be used by automatic level selection algorithm (`ABRController`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get autoLevelCapping(): number;

set autoLevelCapping(newLevel: number);
```
